definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: The Japanese firm could learn a good deal from Hyundai and Kia.
sentences.chinese: 日本公司可以向现代和起亚学习。

sentences.english: Kia Motors America said faulty wiring harnesses could short and cause a fire.
sentences.chinese: 美国起亚表示有问题的电线套因过短有可能引起起火。

sentences.english: The biggest beneficiaries were companies like Dacia, Fiat, Suzuki and Kia.
sentences.chinese: 最大的受益人是达契亚，菲亚特，铃木和起亚。

definition: Škoda, Czech Republic car manufacturer, a subsidiary of Volkswagen Group
Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make
